text: Lin Yu-ting (; born 13 December 1995) is a Taiwanese boxer. She won a gold medal at the 2024 Summer Olympics. She is the first winner of an Olympic gold medal in boxing for Chinese Taipei. Lin started boxing at 13; she started to protect her mother from domestic violence. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1995 births Category:Boxers Category:Living people Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2022 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2024 Summer Olympics Category:Olympians for Taiwan Category:Olympic gold medalists
title: Lin Yu-ting
